parameters.name: Intersections
parameters.description: Array of booleans; true indicates to exclude the corresponding intersect region in the array of intersect regions returned by IIntersectFeatureData::GetIntersections

title: IIntersectFeatureData.SetIntersections
description: Specifies which of the intersect regions to exclude from this intersect feature.
